name: Pumpkin Chuck
description:
This is my first game made around America's favorite October sport! That's right pumpkin chuckin'

All of the controls are in game while you are playing and should be pretty simple to follow. The upgrades section is necessary to win the game of achieving 2200 distance!

I hope you guys enjoy!

Assets and music are open / free!

Credits:

Pumpkins: 3d.rina, Cannon: Storm Bringer Studios, Town: Lylek Games, Balloon: Zaampo Games, and Airplane: understone, Music: Google OpenSource Audio
